name: Fun Strike 3D
description:
Shift the ball up and down to to avoid from all obstacles. Make sure to shape the ball correctly!
Avoid from all obstacles and complete all levels. Can you complete all levels ?


Main Features

- Addictive gameplay
- Simple and satisfying
- Fun and relaxing to play
- Easy controls
- Bright effects
- Charming graphics
- Many different locations
- Intense arcade gameplay
- Unlock unique balls
